name: Finance
description: Businesses involved in banking, investing, and managing money.

name: Healthcare
description: Organizations providing medical services, manufacturing medical equipment, or developing pharmaceuticals.

name: Technology
description: Companies focused on software, hardware, and digital services.

name: Education
description: Institutions and services offering teaching, training, and learning.

name: Retail
description: Businesses that sell consumer goods and services directly to customers.

name: Manufacturing
description: Companies involved in producing goods from raw materials.

name: Transportation
description: Industries providing travel and freight services.

name: Energy
description: Sectors related to the production and distribution of energy, including oil, gas, and renewables.

name: Hospitality
description: Businesses focused on lodging, food service, and tourism.

name: Agriculture
description: Firms engaged in farming, forestry, and food production.
